dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR100 consists of 60000 images with size of 32 × 32, and each class contains 500 images for training and 100 for testing. The dataset is split into 10 disjoint sub-datasets for continual learning.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100

dcterms:creator: Jiayu Wu
Qixiang Zhang
Guoxi Xu
dcterms:description: TinyImageNet consists of 120000 images with input image size 64 × 64, containing 200 classes with 500 for training, 50 for validation, and 50 for testing. The dataset is split into 25 disjoint sub-datasets for continual learning.
dcterms:title: TinyImageNet

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
SM Ali Eslami
Luc Van Gool
Christopher KI Williams
John Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: PASCAL-VOC 2012 contains 20 classes and is used for class-incremental learning. The dataset is split into three kinds of sub-datasets simulating data-streams in continual learning settings.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-VOC
